comment: She was amazing! Very nice and very chill. I always had a good time in her class. I think there were only 3 essays. Nothing too complicated or terrible. If you have questions she is always there to help; if you need an extension just reach out. I would definitely recommend this course.

Very sweet and gave great feedback! Tells you exactly what she's looking for and gives tons of resources. There's 3 essays and a lot of extra credit or make-up opportunities. Very easy to contact and super understanding.

Show up to class and be respectful. That is all you need to do to pass the course. A very kind grader on essays. Gives great insight and makes it clear on what she expects/wants from you with each essay.

No tests, just essays. Very willing to help you write an essay that will receive a good grade. Lots of in class activities so attendance is needed. however, very sweet and caring and will help you as much as possible. you will need to get the reading materials though because sometimes there are quizzes over it
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Get ready to read
